net.alevel.asteroids.game

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alevel.asteroids.game.GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILogic

    public class GameLogic
extends Object
implements ILogic
    Represents the main simulation logic. It manages the simulation and tells it what to do and what to render each time the game loop asks. The functions here are called every time the game loop in GameEngine repeats

      • update

        public void update(float accumulatedTime,
                   float interval,
                   Input input)
            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ILogic
        Defines what should happen each update (i.e what the simulation should do at that time) (e.g. change object states and/or positions)
        Specified by:
        update in interface ILogic
        interval - the time between this update and the previous update (in terms of in game clock)
        input - the sample of the mouse and keyboard inputs at a certain instant
        Throws:
        IOException
